spec_data.Name: pidgin-devel
spec_data.Description:
The pidgin-devel package contains the header files, developer
documentation, and libraries required for development of Pidgin scripts
and plugins.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 09 Jun 2017 05:02:25 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Development headers and libraries for pidgin
